tooltip.true: Scripts will check for updates
tooltip.false:
Scripts will still check for updates but will not present the user
with a GUI when an update is available
tooltip.stop: Scripts will NOT check for updates

tooltip.true: Scripts will check to see if any updates are available using Chocolatey or the user's defined package manager
tooltip.false: Scripts will not check for updates using Chocolatey or the user's defined package manager

tooltip.true:
Scripts will check to see if you have a version of `Premiere`, `After Effects`, or `Photoshop` installed
that isn't already accounted for and attempt to update some internal files
tooltip.false:
Scripts will not check to see if you have a version of `Premiere`, `After Effects`, or `Photoshop` installed
that isn't already accounted for.

tooltip.true: Scripts will check the upstream git branch for any changes and prompt the user when they occur
tooltip.false: Scripts will not check the upstream git branch for any changes

tooltip.true: Scripts will check to see if there are any third party Lib updates
tooltip.false: Scripts will check to see if there are any third party Lib updates

tooltip.true: Scripts will check to see if there is an newer version of AutoHotkey available for download
tooltip.false: Scripts will check to see if there is an newer version of AutoHotkey available for download

tooltip.true:
A dark theme will be applied to certain GUI elements wherever possible.
These GUI elements may need to be reloaded to take effect
tooltip.false:
A lighter theme will be applied to certain GUI elements wherever possible.
These GUI elements may need to be reloaded to take effect
tooltip.stop: The users OS version is too low for this feature

tooltip.true: `PC Startup.ahk` script will automatically run at PC startup
tooltip.false: `PC Startup.ahk` script will no longer run at PC startup

tooltip.true:
Startup scripts will set the current Premiere Pro and After Effects version based off the current installed version.
Note: startup.adobeVerOverride() must be called in one of the user's scripts
tooltip.false: The current versions of Premiere Pro and After Effects must be set by the user

tooltip.true: `discord.button(`'DiscReply.png`')` will disable the @ ping automatically when replying
tooltip.false: `discord.button(`'DiscReply.png`')` will not disable the @ ping when replying

tooltip.true: `getTimeline()` will set new UIA values on first use
tooltip.false: `getTimeline()` will not set new UIA values

tooltip.true: `getTimeline()` will set new UIA values on first use once per day
tooltip.false: `getTimeline()` will always set new UIA values on first use

tooltip.true: Currently selected Adobe versions will be shown to the user during script startup
tooltip.false: Currently selected Adobe versions will not be shown to the user during script startup

tooltip.true: MButton will activate extra functionality within Windows Explorer windows
tooltip.false: Thio's MButton script will not be used in Windows Explorer

tooltip.true: Thio's script will use MButton
tooltip.false: Thio's script will use F14 (by default, can be changed in settings.ini)

tooltip.true:
The `prem {` class will monitor your currently active sequence and your previously active sequence
so that you may swap between them
tooltip.false: The `prem {` class will not monitor your active sequences

tooltip.true: `autosave.ahk` will save regardless of the active window
tooltip.false: `autosave.ahk` will only save the active window

tooltip.true: `autosave.ahk` will beep to alert the user it is attempting to save
tooltip.false: `autosave.ahk` will no longer beep to alert the user that it is attempting to save

tooltip.true: `autosave.ahk` will check to ensure you haven't recently interacted with the mouse
tooltip.false: `autosave.ahk` will no longer check to ensure you haven't recently interacted with the mouse

tooltip.true: Manually saving within Premiere/After Effects will reset `autosave.ahk` timer
tooltip.false: Manually saving within Premiere/After Effects will have no effect on `autosave.ahk`

tooltip.true: `autosave.ahk` will attempt to restart Premiere playback after a save attempt has been made
tooltip.false: `autosave.ahk` will not attempt to restart Premiere playback after a save attempt has been made

tooltip.true: `checklist.ahk` will produce tooltips to remind you if you've paused the timer
tooltip.false: `checklist.ahk` will no longer produce tooltips to remind you if you've paused the timer

tooltip.true: `checklist.ahk` will create a hotkey to start/stop the timer. (Shift & Media_Play_Pause)
tooltip.false: `checklist.ahk` will no longer create a hotkey to start/stop the timer.
